Com_Photo_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>I'd like to paint a picture of the Ring Ruins
everyone's talking about. But they're so
far away.
What I need is a <clr:0000>big, impressive picture<clr:ffff>
of the ruins to use as reference.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Sorry... I got a little carried away.<sp:0:4:0>It's just that the <clr:0000>rumored beast<clr:ffff> is a hot
topic around the <clr:0000>Stable Association <clr:ffff>right
now, and, you know...<sp:5:1:0> It's so exciting...
Talk1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>Hey, Link! Replacing our furnishings is
such a bother!<sp:0:4:0>That decoration is a popular lucky charm
right now, so we made sure to get one
for our stable.<sp:0:4:0>If you want your own, they sell them
in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>, which is in the
mountains to the southeast.
Talk1009:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseM>Now, now, Link!<sp:5:0:0> Please don't make me
tell you again!<sp:0:4:0>If you want one of these decorations,
you should go buy one for yourself.<sp:0:4:0>They sell them in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>, which
you can find in the mountains southeast
of here.
Com_FirstTime_Only01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Here's a little something to mark your first
visit to <clr:0000>Wetland Stable<clr:ffff>...
Com_FirstTime_Only02:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Not only is it your first visit to <clr:0000>Wetland<clr:ffff>
<clr:0000>Stable<clr:ffff> but you've also <clr:0000>registered a horse<clr:ffff>.
So here...
Com_FirstTime_Only03:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff>You <clr:0000>slept in a regular bed<clr:ffff> during your
first visit to <clr:0000>Wetland Stable<clr:ffff>, so...
Com_Photo_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Admiration_01>Whoa!<sp:5:0:0> That painting of the Ring Ruins
really makes a big impact in here!
Com_Photo_Thank:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_01>Thanks to you, Link, I got that painting
I wanted. Oh, everyone's going to talk
about this stable now!
A ring garland...<sp:5:0:0> A picture of the
Ring Ruins...<sp:5:0:0> Feels great to have all
these rings right here!
Com_Photo_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>So,<sp:5:0:0> what do you think of that
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins picture<clr:ffff>?
Talk1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>Huh? At Lakeside Stable?!<sp:0:4:0>...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sigh_01>I see... So the rumors about the so-called
beast weren't very true, then.<sp:0:4:0>I must admit, it was thrilling to think that
there was a mysterious beast out there,
ready to spring into the open.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Admiration_01>But thank you for letting me know. As
disappointing as it is, it's better to know
the truth.
Stables should be providing accurate
information for travelers and customers,
so it's important to know the real story!
Thank you for this valuable information.
Since you helped the stable out, here...
Com_Photo_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Admiration_01>Since I'm going to the trouble of hanging
a painting, I'd sure like to hang one of the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins <clr:ffff>everyone's talking about.
The Ring Ruins are ruins that are each
shaped like rings. They all fell around
Kakariko Village in the <clr:0000>southeast<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Happy_00>My gosh, are they ever a hot topic with
all the customers who come here!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>So I'd like to have a<clr:0000> BIG painting <clr:ffff>of them
to hang on the wall. One that shows that
<clr:0000>ring-like shape <clr:ffff>they have.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>But I can't paint that scene without seeing
it. Sure, I can see some of the ruins from
here, but it's all too far away to see well.
Anyway, I'd really like to do up that
painting, but I'm just not sure how to
go about it.
Talk1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>That's a good reward, right? I hope you
visit us again soon!
BurnedWakka_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0201>If you're SO interested in that decoration,
how about you go buy your own?

They're sold in <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>, which is
off in the mountainous area to the
southeast of here. So, there you are!
Com_Photo_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Wait, do you have a picture of the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>?
Talk1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal>Link! Are you interested in those pictures
after all?<sp:0:4:0>It's not like the footprints of that
<clr:0000>rumored beast <clr:ffff>are something you
see every day, eh?
Com_Photo_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think>Since I'm going to be hanging a painting
up, I'd like to hang one that shows the
Ring Ruins around Kakariko Village.
Everyone's talking about them these days!


I'd really like to display it in a big way,
so the<clr:0000> picture<clr:ffff> needs to show off their
unusual <clr:0000>ring-like shape<clr:ffff>.
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Sigh_00>Say, Link,<sp:5:0:0> have you heard about the
trouble in <clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>All that good water polluted by <clr:0000>some kind
of mysterious muck<clr:ffff>. As far as I know,
no one knows where it came from.
It's terrible for the Zora, of course,
being water folk. I'm not sure how
they'll manage.
<clr:0000>Zora's Domain<clr:ffff> is to the east past the
<clr:0000>Lanayru Wetlands<clr:ffff>. I used to recommend
it to tourists, but...well...
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Link, are you still interested in the
Dondon footprints?<sp:0:4:0>To think that the rumors about a beast
were actually about animals Princess
Zelda cared for at Lakeside Stable...
All sorts of customers had been coming
to ask if those rumors were true.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:LaughS_00>Thanks to your information, Link, we can
give them the real story. You really helped
us out!
Providing information is an essential
stable duty. The truth is always more
important than fanciful ideas.
Com_Photo_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:QuestionSurprise_01>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Did you bring me a picture of the
<clr:0000>Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>?!
Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionSurprise_00>Link! Did those drawings catch your
eye? Well, I'll let you in on a secret.
They're actually images of...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>Hm? A customer?<sp:5:0:0> Please, allow me to
assist you at the counter.
Com_Photo_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sigh>You can see them from this stable, but
they're still too far away for me to paint
them properly.<sp:5:0:0> I'm not sure what to do.
Com_Photo_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have a <clr:0000>picture of the Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>,
please show it to me!
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_01>Link, have you already decided where
you'll head next? Perhaps the beautiful
city of water, Zora's Domain?<sp:0:4:0>I also recommend <clr:0000>Kakariko Village<clr:ffff>. It's
a popular spot due to its unusual ruins.
Have you seen them?
<sp:3:0:2:0701>They're hard to miss. As you exit the
stable, head to your right, toward the
<clr:0000>big ring<clr:ffff>.
Com_Photo_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0101>Whoa!<sp:5:0:0> I'm really happy with this nice, big
painting of the Ring Ruins here.

But if you have a different <clr:0000>picture of the
Ring Ruins<clr:ffff>, I'm happy to copy it and hang
it there instead.
Yes, if you ever want to see some fresh
art up there, just show me a new image!
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Admiration_01>That's right! Just a little while ago, a
customer who came from the <clr:0000>south<clr:ffff> drew
them for me.
It seems that there were <clr:0000>twin kids <clr:ffff>at a
stable somewhere who said they'd seen it.<sp:0:4:0>The customer heard all about the beast
and the footprints from those kids.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_01>Now, I don't tend to believe all of the wild
tales that kids tell, but...<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>There's been a lot of chatter around the
<clr:0000>Stable Association <clr:ffff>about this <clr:0000>rumored
beast<clr:ffff>, so I thought it might be true.
Com_Photo_08:
They really are huge ruins, aren't they...<sp:5:0:0>
Who built those? And why? What was
their purpose?
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Understand_00>No wonder that ruins falling out of
the sky has caused such a stir all
around Hyrule.
